channel.description: Connecting people, changing lives by the authority of God's Word and the power of the Holy Spirit to experience powerful living. This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
channel.itunes:author: Queen Esther
channel.itunes:subtitle: Powerful Living Network
channel.itunes:summary: Connecting people, changing lives by the authority of God's Word and the power of the Holy Spirit to experience powerful living. This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
channel.itunes:keywords: prayer, praise, love, faith Jesus, Christ, Holy Spirit,

item.title: EPISODE30 - Holiday Season Prayer of Comfort
item.author: qfphillips@gmail.com
item.description: When tragedy strikes during the holiday season it is one of the most painful times of the year that will impact a family's holiday mood for years to come. This prayer call will focus on the prayer of comfort for persons & families that are suffering the loss of loved one, and are still feeling the pains of discomfort from years past. If you believe in the "power of prayer" please join us.
item.itunes:author: Queen Esther
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE30 - Holiday Season Prayer of Comfort
item.itunes:summary: When tragedy strikes during the holiday season it is one of the most painful times of the year that will impact a family's holiday mood for years to come. item.title: EPISODE20 - Provoked for Purpose & Prayer
item.author: qfphillips@gmail.com
item.description: Referenced 1 Samuel 1...Pininnah provoked Hannah because she was barren. But the more she provoked (vexed) Hannah, the more intensified were Hannah's prayers. She prayed until she brought forth God's purpose in the person of Samuel. The transition of an era. The person that's provoking you can cause you to pray until you give birth to purpose! Don't stop praying!
item.itunes:author: Queen Esther
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE20 - Provoked for Purpose & Prayer
item.itunes:summary: Referenced 1 Samuel 1...Pininnah provoked Hannah because she was barren. But the more she provoked (vexed) Hannah, the more intensified were Hannah's prayers. She prayed until she brought forth God's purpose in the person of Samuel. The transition of an era. The person that's provoking you can cause you to pray until you give birth to purpose! Don't stop praying!

item.title: EPISODE8 - A Father's Perspective- Pt. 3
item.author: qfphillips@gmail.com
item.description: MIA fathers - how to deal with fathers missing in action. Special guest Pastor Charles L. Stevenson will give straight talk about estranged relationships, and no relationship with your father-- dealing with anger, bitterness, hatred for fathers that walked away from his family; How should mothers handle MIA fathers? You don't want to miss this episode!!!

item.author: qfphillips@gmail.com
item.description: This episode is the last one dedicated to mothers in observance of Mother's Day/month. Discussion: how to deal with grief during Mother's Day season if your mother is deceased. The host and co-host will share openly the pain of separation after the death of their mother.

item.title: EPISODE1 - Powerful Living- Starting Point
item.author: qfphillips@gmail.com
item.description: Do you want to have a powerful, life-changing experience? Then it's time you dance to a different beat with new lyrics: I can, you can... You can live a powerful life by embracing the supernatural power of God available to everyone through His Holy Spirit. If you're tired of the routine, mundane life, filled with challenges, disappointments, depression and defeat, then this show is for you! Start listening to the simplistic approach and insight of Prophetess Queen Esther Phillips to start you on your way to powerful living, redirect you, and encourage you to excel in your spiritual life. She applies biblical principles to enhance practical living. The prayers, lessons and discussions will empower you. You can experience powerful living through the supernatural power of God just as He intended from the beginning of time.
